SELECT VIDEO_NO, MEMBER_NO, V_THUMNAIL, V_TITLE, V_READ_COUNT, TO_CHAR(V_CREATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') V_CREATE
FROM VIDEO WHERE FOLDER_NO = #{folderNo} AND V_DEL_YN = 'N' AND V_OPEN_FL <= #{flag} ORDER BY VIDEO_NO

SELECT VIDEO_NO, MEMBER_NO, V_TITLE, V_CONTENT, VIDEO_PATH||VIDEO_RENAME VIDEO_PATH, VIDEO_ORIGINAL_NAME, V_OPEN_FL, V_SCRAP_YN, FOLDER_NO, V_THUMNAIL, V_SCRAP_ALLOW_YN, V_READ_COUNT, TO_CHAR(V_CREATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') V_CREATE FROM VIDEO WHERE VIDEO_NO = #{videoNo}

SELECT LEVEL, C.* FROM
(SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - COMMENT_CREATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - COMMENT_CREATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - COMMENT_CREATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - COMMENT_CREATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - COMMENT_CREATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - COMMENT_CREATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(COMMENT_CREATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END COMMENT_CREATE, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, PARENT_COMMENT_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" WHERE PARENT_COMMENT_NO = MAIN.COMMENT_NO AND COMMENT_DEL_YN='N') CHILD_COMMENT_COUNT, (SELECT FONT_PATH FROM FONT_SHOP WHERE FONT_NO = OWN_FONT_NO) FONT_PATH FROM "COMMENT" MAIN JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{videoNo} AND BOARD_TYPE_NO = 3 AND COMMENT_DEL_YN = 'N') C START WITH PARENT_COMMENT_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR COMMENT_NO = PARENT_COMMENT_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY COMMENT_NO DESC

mapper.update: UPDATE VIDEO SET V_TITLE = #{videoTitle}, V_CONTENT = #{videoContent}, V_OPEN_FL = #{openFlag}, FOLDER_NO = #{folderNo}, V_SCRAP_ALLOW_YN = #{videoScrapAllowYN} WHERE VIDEO_NO = #{videoNo}
